name: Vegan Strawberry Shortcake Smoothie
description: This creamy, just-sweet-enough smoothie makes it easy to keep those healthy eating resolutions.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups plain, unsweetened almond milk (store bought or unflavored homemade)
1 tablespoon vegetable-based protein powder, such as pea or hemp (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine berries, almond milk, dates, flax seed, protein powder, vanilla, and maca powder in blender and blend on high speed until completely smooth, about 1 minute. Divide between two glasses and serve cold. Smoothie can be kept in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to two days. Reblend or shake well before serving.
